passives.name: Stone Extension
passives.desc:
Stone use +2

When using Stone:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Self: 5 turns BRV Regen

While BRV at least 30% of MAX:
• Stone becomes Stone+ (increases BRV based on INT BRV before BRV attack; triggers additional HP attack after use; high turn rate)

After using Stone、 Stone+:
• BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (increases BRV based on INT BRV; magic BRV attack; moderately increased BRV damage) for 5 turns
passives.short_desc: Stone Extension: Boost to Stone

passives.name: Buffed Initial Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises INT BRV、 largely raises MAX BRV with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Initial Boost: Raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV

passives.name: Medica II Extension
passives.desc:
When using Medica II:
 • Increases BRV based on INT BRV before BRV multiplier
 • Slightly increased BRV multiplier
 • Party: 5 turns MAX BRV Up II
 • Slight boost to BRV granted to allies
passives.short_desc: Medica II Extension: Boost to Medica II

passives.name: Shatter Resonance
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's INT BRV、 MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Shatter Resonance: Raises party's INT BRV、 MAX BRV

passives.name: BRV Rejuvenate Extension
passives.desc: When using BRV Rejuvenate:\n • Adds effect that slightly raises party's MAX BRV for 3 turns
passives.short_desc: BRV Rejuvenate Extension: Boost to BRV Rejuvenate

passive.name: BRV Rejuvenate Growth
passive.short_desc: BRV Rejuvenate Growth: Boost to BRV Rejuvenate

passive.name: Bravery Break Hit
passive.desc: Increases BRV by 30% of INT BRV when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break once per turn

passive.name: Illusory Magic
passive.desc: When using Stone、 Stone+:\n • BRV damage boost\n • Target: 1 turn DEF Down I

passive.name: Familial Ties
passive.desc: When using Medica II:\n • Boost to BRV granted to allies based on own current BRV\n • Self: 5 turns MAX BRV Up I
passive.short_desc: Familial Ties: Boost to Medica II

passive.short_desc: Hands of Healing: May equip Pulse of Life

passives.name: Pulse of Life Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Pulse of Life
passives.short_desc: Pulse of Life Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Pulse of Life

passives.desc: While equipping EX weapon Aymur (XIV) or passive ability Hands of Healing:\n• Moderately increased ATK、 SPD
passives.short_desc: Hands of Healing Attack Initiative: Raises ATK、 SPD

passive.desc:
Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Stone、 Stone+

After using Medica II:
 • Moderately increased BRV
passive.short_desc: Dark Scion's Power: Increases BRV damage dealt with Stone、 Stone+; increases BRV after using Medica II

passive.name: Hands of Healing Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Pulse of Life
passive.short_desc: Hands of Healing Extension: Boost to Pulse of Life

passives.name: Pulse of Life BRV Regen Up Starting Longer Recast MAX
passives.desc:
When using Pulse of Life:
 • Moderate BRV Regen boost、 duration +1
 • MAX BRV Up duration +1
 • HP Attack+ changed duration +1

9 turns BRV Regen、 full recast gauge at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Pulse of Life BRV Regen Up Starting Longer Recast MAX: Boost to Pulse of Life

passives.name: Hands of Healing Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Aymur (XIV)+ or passive ability Hands of Healing Extension:\n • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Hands of Healing Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Hands of Healing Extension Attack All Boost
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Aymur (XIV)+ or passive ability Hands of Healing Extension:\n • Slightly raises party's MAX BRV、 moderately raises party's ATK
passives.short_desc: Hands of Healing Extension Attack All Boost: Raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Quick Pulse of Life Recast Up Preserve++
passives.desc:
Slightly raises recast speed of Pulse of Life

When using Pulse of Life:
 • Turn rate becomes instantaneous
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning、 support

After using Pulse of Life:
 • HP Attack、 HP Attack+ become HP Attack++ (increases BRV based on INT BRV、 before HP attack; increased BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%) for 9 turns

Enemy attacks will not reduce HP below 1 while own HP is at least 50% of MAX
passives.short_desc: Quick Pulse of Life Recast Up Preserve++: Boost to Pulse of Life; prevents HP from dropping below 1 with sufficient HP
